title: Day 14: Four-Legged Olympians
description:
Team USA groomer Stephanie Simpson introduces us to Tsetserleg TSF, known as Thomas, who at 1085 lbs is the biggest guest we’ve had on the podcast yet. Thomas and Stephanie give us insight into the logistics of bringing horses to the Games, the amazing treatment they receive and if they feel satisfaction after a good performance.

In The Village takes you inside one of the most exclusive areas of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games to discover the daily lives of athletes. Follow In the Village wherever you get your podcasts to automatically download every day until the closing ceremony.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
